main event: A saucer-shaped, dull silver-gray object was observed drifting across the sky in Neshua, New Hampshire, making a sound like a small motor.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 3-5 seconds., The object emitted jets of vapor streaming straight up into the clouds., The object did not produce any remarkable visual trail., Witnesses assess that the sighting was most likely a known cause., The report does not indicate that the witness provided information to support the identification of the object.
